question: The single discount equal to three consecutive discounts of 10%, 12% and 5% is :
explanation:
Single equivalent discount for 10% and 12%.
$latex = \\left ( 10+12-\\frac{10\\times 12}{100} \\right )\\% = 20.8\\%&s=1$
Single equivalent discount for 20.8% and 5%. 
$latex = \\left ( 20.8+5-\\frac{20.8\\times 5}{100} \\right )\\% = 24.76\\%&s=1$
Hence option [C] is correct answer.
